body: I just think that half sister is really love him or just seek some revenge for her mother Rape?
need part 3...Kill that motherfucker as horribly as possible.Go & get your revenge girl .

Seems to me the girl is taking her revenge and I think she wants the father gone so she could have her brother.

Honestly this is somewhat dark and I am wanting a sequel.
from what google translate tells me the father fucked the maid and the girl was born, so they are half siblings, and I don't think the boy knows...
Not much of a conclusion though, we don’t know if her intentions are pure
